definitions.definition: To interrupt the continuance of; to put an end to, especially as regards commercial productions; to stop producing , making , or supplying .
examples: They plan to discontinue that design.

definitions.definition: To consciously cease the ingestion or administration of (a pharmaceutical drug).

main_definition: ( transitive ) To interrupt the continuance of; to put an end to, especially as regards commercial productions; to stop producing , making , or supplying .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To consciously cease the ingestion or administration of (a pharmaceutical drug).
